description:
Fujiwara is a second-year student at Mizuho High. He is often nicknamed as Taku by his close friends and seems romantically involved with Mutsumi of the girls` team. Fujiwara is the captain of Mizuho basketball team and plays the position of point guard. He attended Mizuho Junior High and was Miura`s teammate at that time as well.
Source: Wiki
name: Fujiwara Takumi
